title: Computer/Game crash
body: I am in desperate need of help. I recently have had an error occur multiple times involving the game freezing my computer post loading screen. Champ select and loading go like normal. Once the game loads up, as soon as the first champ is spawning into the game, my computer freezes and makes a weird sound, almost like vibrating. I have even recreated it in a custom game. It has happened to the point that I am currently in the lower priority queue for 10 mins for 5 games. If anybody knows what is causing this or any help please let me know.

replies.body: This may be an issue with your PC's drivers or hardware, but I wanted to see if you were running Windows 10 and installed some updates recently.
Yes I have but I have seemed to fix it with going to compatibility settings. I don't believe I saved it the first time, completely my mistake. Thank you for the reply though.
Im have same exact problems that you had. Can you please specify on how you resolved these issues by doing something with the compatibility settings?

I just went with the default compatibility settings by right clicking on the league icon on my desktop and selecting troubleshoot compatibility on windows 10. Follow the prompt and don't forget to select save these settings.
If it occurs again just reply and we will figure it out together.

so i just tried out the compatibility troubleshooter and it said that the program was incompatible. then it said with a big check mark that it was "fixed" but when i went to try it out again, the computer crashes and makes a buzzing noise right before the champion spawns as always.
never mind. its fixed and works no problem now. THANK YOU SO MUCH DUDE!
Yeah, not a problem at all.
